attributes.action: a petition for public enquiry into breeches of police honesty, crooked policing, dishonest police officers, bent cop's and council staff.
attributes.additional_details:
The police can no longer be trusted as Stated in a broadcast speech by Therasa May, Home Secretary.

Thus The integrity and honesty of police staff - employment breeches of truth & honesty policy at all times, including fraud by abuse of position and legal abuse of process towards the public requires a public enquiry & full investigation. That is the purpose & intent of this petition.
